View Javadoc
1   package com.test.vendor.db2;
2   
3   import com.test.AbstractTestSuite;
4   import org.hibernate.cfg.JdbcSettings;
5   import spring.SpringApp;
6   
7   public abstract class ConcreteDb2SuiteIT extends AbstractTestSuite {
8   
9       public ConcreteDb2SuiteIT() {
10          this.config();
11      }
12      
13      public void config() {
14  
15          this.jdbcURL = SpringApp.propsDb2.getProperty(JdbcSettings.JAKARTA_JDBC_URL);
16          this.jdbcUser = SpringApp.propsDb2.getProperty(JdbcSettings.JAKARTA_JDBC_USER);
17          this.jdbcPass = SpringApp.propsDb2.getProperty(JdbcSettings.JAKARTA_JDBC_PASSWORD);
18  
19          this.jsqlDatabaseName = "DB2INST1";
20          this.jsqlTableName = "STUDENT";
21          this.jsqlColumnName = "STUDENT_ID";
22          
23          this.jdbcColumnForDatabaseName = "schemaname";
24          this.jdbcColumnForTableName = "name";
25          this.jdbcColumnForColumnName = "name";
26          
27          this.jdbcQueryForDatabaseNames = "select trim("+ this.jdbcColumnForDatabaseName +") "+ this.jdbcColumnForDatabaseName +" from syscat.schemata";
28          this.jdbcQueryForTableNames = "select "+ this.jdbcColumnForTableName +" from sysibm.systables where creator = '"+ this.jsqlDatabaseName +"'";
29          this.jdbcQueryForColumnNames = "select "+ this.jdbcColumnForColumnName + " from sysibm.syscolumns where coltype != 'BLOB' and tbcreator = '"+ this.jsqlDatabaseName +"' and tbname = '"+ this.jsqlTableName +"'";
30          this.jdbcQueryForValues = "SELECT "+ this.jsqlColumnName +" FROM "+ this.jsqlDatabaseName +"."+ this.jsqlTableName;
31      }
32  }
